src:
Uber retiró plan de inversión en Colombia
El plan de inversión incluía nuevo centro de excelencia, e iba a generar 600 empleos directos.
02 Nov 2019, 00:15 by Willmary Montilla-Uber


La inversión en Colombia por parte de la plataforma generaría 600 empleos directos. Foto: Referencial Pixabay.

Compartir: Facebook Twitter
La empresa de tecnología Uber anunció que dejará de invertir los 40 millones de dólares que tenía planeados para la construcción de su tercer Centro de Excelencia de Latinoamérica en Colombia, debido a falta de estabilidad regulatoria en Colombia y apoyo institucional a la innovación.
Este centro planeaba abrir sus puertas para el 2020 y proyectaba la creación de 600 nuevos empleos directos. Colombia, por su potencial y relevancia para la región había sido elegida por la compañía como el tercer mercado en Latinoamérica para ser sede de uno de sus Centros de  Excelencia.
Sin embargo, tras reiterados intentos de establecer vías de diálogo en pro de la seguridad jurídica de la operación, el equipo directivo global de Uber ha decidido reubicar el destino de esta inversión fuera del país.
Este Centro de Excelencia hubiera brindado soporte especializado en materia de servicio y seguridad a usuarios, Socios Conductores y Socios Repartidores de las aplicaciones Uber y Uber Eats en Latinoamérica.

También te puede interesar leer: Datos de 2 millones colombianos expuestos

“?En Uber se había proyectado esta gran inversión para Colombia. Sin embargo, tras 6 años de buscar vías de diálogo y en ausencia de una hoja de ruta para avanzar en estabilidad regulatoria y seguridad jurídica, lamentamos tener que reubicar el destino de esta inversión planeada para inicios de 2020”, expresó Nicolás Pardo, gerente general de Uber Colombia. 
A diferencia de Colombia, Uber ya está regulado en más de 80 jurisdicciones en América Latina, incluyendo a ciudades Curitiba, Rio o La Paz), estados Mendoza, Jalisco, Puerto Rico y el Estado de México y países, como Brasil, Uruguay y Paraguay. Chile, Ecuador y Perú, entretanto, ya tienen discusiones avanzadas sobre el tema.
“Una vez más, reiteramos nuestra voluntad para generar vías de diálogo con el Gobierno y todos los actores y diseñar en conjunto estrategias de movilidad sostenibles, que contribuyan al desarrollo de Colombia y fomenten la inversión extranjera. ?Nuestro compromiso es seguir aquí, apostándole con toda al país, y seguir siendo una opción de movilidad para más de 2 millones de usuarios y de autoempleo para más de 88,000 Socios Conductores registrados en la aplicación”, concluyó Pardo.

Willmary Montilla-Uber - Colombia.com

Compartir: Facebook Twitter
text:
[Information] Kail'thas is disappearing, Uther comes! Wow expansion 'dark land' content information
02 Nov 2019, 00:50 by Bae Eun-sang



Game Director Ion Hedgecostas unveiled the new expansion pack Darklands during the BlizzCon 2019 World of Warcraft: What's New today session. It was filled with fascinating and interesting content, from new areas to new content, reorganization of existing systems and rewards.
What is the 'dark ground' where dead souls gather in Azeroth?
The Dark Land is composed of four basic regions: the Bulwark of Ascension, Maldraxus, Monghwan Forest, and Oman's Territory, the metropolis of Oribos, and the Manreb, The Maw.
In the world of Azeroth, the dead soul of life crosses between life and death. The soul flows into the dark land before an ancient being called the 'aviter'. Arbitr looks at the life of the soul and sends it to the appropriate area.
There is anima in the soul. The dark land is maintained on the basis of anima. However, Sylvanas destroyed the Lich King's helmet and the system of death collapsed. Now all souls are heading to hell, and the whole of the dark land, which lacks anima, is withering.



Main Content # 1-Choose one of the four covenants and go through the campaign, no artifact
In the Dark Land, four covenants are divided into sections. Players can form a solidarity with one or more of the entire expansion pack as if they were on a campaign in Battle for Azeroth.
As you level up, you gain new abilities based on your chosen covenant tier. There are also two active skills, one for the job and one for the common skill. With Manreb content, you can create a 'Soul Binding' relationship with a particular unit to take advantage of the traits and bonuses present in that character. (The artifact system says no more.)
Covenants provide a variety of shape transformation rewards. There is also a sanctuary for each covenant. Players can develop a sanctuary to change from a dusty, desolate space to a crowded place.



The Bulwark of Ascension consists of the Kyrian Covenant. Follow the rules and place the burdens of the past into the place where souls full of faith gather. The soul of 'Usser' is representative, and it is a bright and beautiful area unlike the atmosphere of the dark ground.












At Maldrasus, you can meet the Necrolord Covenant. It is hostile and gathers souls to fight for survival. A typical example is Draka, which has a dark and humid atmosphere.












There is Night Fae covenant in Monghwan Forest. Here the souls gather, who regard the dark land as the land of rest and resurrection rather than the end of their journey. Cenarius is a good example. It is an area similar to the Emerald Dream in Azeroth.












In Oman's estates they encounter the Venthyr covenant. It is a place where self-esteemed souls gather to repent of their sins in life. The spirit of Kael'thas is representative, with a dark and dreary atmosphere in Gothic architecture.









Main Content # 2-Thapman Rep Region of Hell and the Damned, Challenge Mode Form 1-4
At the top of the dark ground is Maw. Hell is the place where the most dangerous soul dwells, and once trapped like a black hole, the soul can never escape. The indigenous forces of the dark land are unknown places so much that they do not know much about this place.
In the center of hell is the Tower of the Damned. The tower is an endless dungeon that will change shape each time to give you a roguelike feel. This content can be challenged by 1 to 4 players, and can be upgraded by upgrading the character's abilities.


▲ The most dangerous souls are trapped in hell



▲ Climb the cursed tower to strengthen your character

Dungeons & Raids Dungeons 8 new, 10-headed raid dungeons
8 dungeons will be added in the Dark Land. Four are dungeons that can be turned during the level up process, and the other four are Manreb dungeons. The first raid dungeon 'Castle Nathria' will be made up of 10 heads.


▲ The first raid dungeon in the Dark Land, which will consist of 10 bosses

Newly Formed Lion Army Play Death Knight in all races
Bolvar Poldagon set out to fight Sylvanas. Defeated in a cinematic video (he said he wasn't dead), he assembles a knight of death to build up his forces. In the Darklands expansion, Pandaren as well as allied races can be death knights.


▲ All races can play Death Knight

System and Compensation Reorganization To eliminate randomness and provide clear rewards!
Based on the philosophy of ensuring autonomy for players, four major systems will be revamped. Several systems are refined in a way that offers greater choice and provides clear rewards.
1. We plan to reorganize the item so that we can make definite items with the desired proficiency.
2. Weekly Reward Box Every week there is a situation where you pray for Titanforged in front of a reward box. To eliminate excessive randomness, it will now change to selecting one of 5-6 items.
3. Legendary Item Legend Item returns to the dark ground. However, it is not randomly dropped as in the Legion. I will be able to make a legendary item that I want through certain content and get it.
4. Reinforcement of professional identity The revision will be made by paying attention to professional identity rather than whole culture. This is because most players started the game after seeing a job called 'priest' rather than a 'specialist'.



Leveling Reorganization-From 120 → 50, take the land from Pandaria to darkness 60 and go straight to darkness!
The leveling system has been reorganized to raise to 50 levels from the current maximum level of 120, up to level 60. In addition, up to level 50, you can play a single expansion zone of your choice. For example, if you choose Pandaria, you can complete the Pandaria story, take the level 50, and go straight to the Dark Land.



Character Customization ReorganizationFurther refined and diversified customization
You have more choices for character customization. Various customizations such as undead bones and humans with various faces will be added, and more details can be set as desired.













※ BlizzCon 2019 will be held at the Anaheim Convention Center in the US from November 2 to November 3. We will deliver the smallest information from local and Korean. ▶ Inventory BlizzCon 2019 News Center: https://goo.gl/gkLqSp
